Warrior.name: Destruction
Warrior.desc: Deals outstanding amounts of damage and possesses great survivability. Suitable for various combat scenarios

Rogue.name: The Hunt
Rogue.desc: Deals extraordinary amounts of single-target damage. The main damage dealer against Elite Enemies

Mage.name: Erudition
Mage.desc: Deals remarkable amounts of multi-target damage. The main damage dealer against groups of enemies

Shaman.name: Harmony
Shaman.desc: Applies buffs to allies to improve the team's combat capacities

Warlock.name: Nihility
Warlock.desc: Applies debuffs to enemies to reduce their combat capacities

Knight.name: Preservation
Knight.desc: Possesses powerful defensive abilities to protect allies in various ways

Priest.name: Abundance
Priest.desc: Heals allies and restores HP to the team

Memory.name: Remembrance
Memory.desc: Possesses the ability to summon a memosprite with special abilities to fight alongside the team in battle
